file_content.text: Can't tell you how nice it is not to be looking over my shoulder constantly.
You stay sharp out there. Otherwise those Sith will cut you down.
Shh! You hear that? Sounded like... footsteps. Listen!
Steer clear of the starship graveyard. Trust me.
Hm. Maybe it's nothing. But stay on your guard. Death can strike anytime out here.
Congratulations on a successful op. Hoth will be a safer place without those Sith skulking about.
A cadre of Sith assassins recovered some prototype stealth units from the starship graveyard. Now they're invisible and slaughtering us at whim.
I can handle a few Sith.
Invisible Sith? Not good.
They "tested" the stealth tech on our patrols first. Wiped out entire platoons before our people could fire off a shot.
Now they've gotten bolder, started sneaking into the base and killing our troops in their cots. This has to stop. Now.
Our scouts picked up their tracks. We have a rough idea of where they're hiding out.
Fight back.
How are we supposed to fight those blasted Sith when we can't even see them?
I'll defeat the Sith.
Invisible Sith? Not good.
What stealth units?
It's experimental technology, went down with a Republic troop transport. We spent months searching for it, but the Sith beat us to it.
Combating Sith is tough enough, what with all their Force trickery. Now they've got some of the Republic's most advanced technology at their disposal.
And I see you recovered the stealth units. Glad to have our tech back in our hands.
It'll be nice to get some shut-eye without having to worry about some Sith assassin stabbing me in the back. Thank you.
Perhaps I can assist.
You haven't faced Sith like these before.
Guess I don't have a choice.
Those stealth units they're using are Republic property. Bring them back and maybe we can salvage a win out of this debacle.
You stop them. [Refuse quest]
We'll have to quarantine the entire sector if those Sith aren't dealt with.
